education.undergraduate: Princeton University, A.B. Politics/Science in Human Affairs (1978)
education.medical: University of Texas Southwestern Medical School, M.D. (1982)
education.residency: Emory University School of Medicine, Emergency Medicine (1983-1985)

professional_timeline.1985-1997: Emergency Medicine Physician, Medical Center of Plano
professional_timeline.1993-1999: Board Trustee, Teacher Retirement System of Texas
professional_timeline.1994-1997: Board Director, United States Enrichment Corporation (Presidential Appointment)
professional_timeline.1997-present: Founding Partner, Chairman & CEO, Pharos Capital Group
professional_timeline.2021-present: Board of Trustees, California Institute of Technology (Caltech)

notable_attributes.political_donor: Listed as top bundler for Barack Obama

quality_gate_evaluation.reasoning: Multiple authoritative sources confirm identity with consistent biographical details. Wikipedia, official Pharos bio, and Caltech board page all align. Birth date, education, and career timeline verified.
